title: Racist Halloween flier found in Redondo Beach in repeat of 2021, police say
dc:creator: Summer Lin
description: A racist Halloween flier was found in Redondo Beach for the second year in a row, according to authorities.
content:encoded: A racist Halloween flier was found in Redondo Beach for the second year in a row, according to authorities.

media:content.media:description: LOS ANGELES, CA-NOVEMBER 7, 2019: A person walks in Redondo Beach on November 7, 2019, in Los Angeles, California. (Photo By Dania Maxwell / Los Angeles Times)
